alert.note: Alert for Clearwater; Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 07 at 11:12AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and panhandle Idaho, including the following counties, in central Idaho, Idaho. In panhandle Idaho, Clearwater. This includes the following Specific Areas... Grangeville, Highway 95 from Riggins to Whitebird, Riggins, Shepp Ranch near the Salmon River, Indian Creek near the Salmon River, Mackay Bar near the Salmon River, China Bar, Highway 95 north of Riggins and Williams Creek Fire Burn Area. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...High precipitable water and associated rainfall with thunderstorms will be capable of producing localized flash flooding in urban areas, flood-proned basins, and burn scars. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - https://www.weather.gov/mso/hydrology
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
